control.title: Server Control Panel
control.welcome: Welcome to the voice server control panel. Use the buttons above to start or stop the server.
control.guideStep1Desc: Configure the server in the Configuration tab before starting it.
control.guideStep2Desc: Click 'Start Server' to start the voice server.
control.guideStep3Desc: Monitor logs in real-time in the Logs tab.
control.guideStep4Desc: Review the command history in the History tab.

config.title: Server Configuration
config.modelsDesc: Configure the AI models used for voice recognition and natural language processing.
config.whisperModelHelp: Voice recognition model. Larger size = higher accuracy but more memory usage.
config.languageDesc: Configure the default language for voice recognition and automatic translation.
config.defaultLanguageHelp: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., es, en, fr, de, it, pt)
config.translationEnabled: Enable automatic translation of non-English languages
config.translationEnabledHelp: Automatically translate commands in languages other than English before processing them
config.screenshotsDesc: Configure automatic screenshot capture after executing commands.
config.screenshotsEnabledHelp: Automatic screenshot capture after each executed command
config.screenshotDirHelp: Directory where screenshots will be saved
config.networkDesc: Configure the address and port where the server will listen for connections.
config.sslDesc: Enable HTTPS for secure connections. Leave fields empty to use self-signed certificate.
config.sslHelp: Leave fields empty to use self-signed certificate (useful for local development)
config.advancedDesc: Advanced settings for development and security.
config.debugHelp: Show detailed debugging information in logs
config.failsafeHelp: Move mouse to top-left corner to abort automatic operations
config.serviceDesc: Configure automatic application startup on system boot.
config.startOnBoot: Start GUI on system startup (runs as service in system tray)
config.startOnBootHelp: Application will start automatically on login and run minimized in system tray
config.desktopDesc: Install the application in the Linux applications menu for quick access.
config.installDesktopStatus: Application is installed in your applications menu

history.title: Command History
history.noHistoryDesc: Start the server to view command history.
history.serverNotRunningDesc: Start the server to view command history.
history.connectionErrorDesc: Cannot connect to server. Make sure the server is running and accessible.

systemInfo.title: System Information
systemInfo.notAvailableDesc: Start the server to view system information.
systemInfo.serverNotRunningDesc: Start the server to view system information.
systemInfo.loadingDesc: Waiting for server to provide system information...

voice.microphoneDenied: Microphone access denied. Please enable microphone permissions.

errors.loadErrorDesc: Could not load Electron API. Please verify that the preload script is configured correctly.
errors.electronAPINotAvailable: electronAPI is not available after {maxWait}ms. The preload script may not have loaded correctly.
errors.clickToViewProcess: Click to view process using this port
errors.configSavedRestart: Configuration saved and server restarted successfully!
errors.configSavedNoRestart: Configuration saved, but failed to restart server:
errors.configSavedRestarting: Configuration saved. Restarting server to apply changes...
errors.configSavedNote: Note: Start the server to apply the new configuration.
errors.startupServiceInstalled: Startup service installed. The GUI will start automatically on system boot.
errors.killProcess: Do you want to kill this process?
errors.processKilled: Process killed successfully. You can now start the server.
errors.connectionError: Failed to connect to server. Check if the server is running and the port is correct.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. The server may be slow or unresponsive.
errors.sslError: SSL certificate error. The server may be using a self-signed certificate.
